author: Tawana Gilbert
text: I have been experiencing a rather difficult time with my town Mayor.  I feel that the way he is conducting himself  and the decisions he's making is unethical and unfair to taxpayers/citizens/law abiding citizens/ and registered voters.  I really need some guidance with resolving this matter. Can you please direct me to some credible people that are willing to review my information, hear my story and direct me in the next step. Your consideration in assisting me with this matter is graciously appreciated.Thanks
title: Ethical Dilemma with my town Mayor
